name: LetsNurtureNews
0:
”Alexa, ask Lets Nurture”
”Alexa,ask Lets Nurture what's in the android news ?”
”Alexa,ask Lets Nurture what's in the apple news ?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lets nurture
des: Enable LetsNurture skill by going to the settings of your Alexa App and there you go.Once done, just say "Alexa, ask LetsNurture what's in the news?" or "Alexa, ask LetsNurture what's new?", and you will listen to the latest feeds coming straight away from LetsNurture. Now stay tuned with all the updates coming from the LetsNurture family.
